We will not stand by and let Democrats seize your health care, your choices, and your control over life-and-death health decisions with #MedicareForAll.

Republicans are the party of healthcare: 
- Children’s Health Insurance Program, 
- Medicare Advantage for seniors  
- life-saving Medicare prescription drug program 
- America’s first law establishing protections for people with pre-existing conditions.
Knowing the truth, can you really trust Washington with your life-and-death health care decisions?

What’s scary is that all of this is true

✔️ Private, quality health care plans banned

✔️ One size fits all

✔️ Washington control

✔️ Tens of trillions of dollars in taxpayer costs that will hurt you and bankrupt America
You’ll hear today that none of this is true.  That this is all an exaggeration, scare tactics.
When you pull the curtain back on #MedicareForAll the truth is staring at you: Many Americans will pay more, wait longer for health care, and get worse care than you receive now

Here’s something else the politicians won’t tell you: None of this is free.  

Your taxes are doubled to pay for this 'free' health care.  

Doubled.
Individuals should control their health care decisions NOT Washington politicians and bureaucrats.

Experts predict that #MedicareForAll will cause a chronic shortage of doctors, and hospital overcrowding will be an epidemic.

Under #MedicareForAll politicians and bureaucrats – not doctors – call the shots on your health care.

Under #MedicareForAll the big truth is this: 

We are coming for your health care plan, and you’re powerless to keep it.

➡️ Your parents who scraped by so many years to give you and your siblings a good life, the Medicare Advantage plan they and 22 million other seniors rely upon... that’s ripped from them under #MedicareForAll

➡️ Your brother proudly serves his country in the military, willing to give his life to keep us free.  His health care – TRICARE – that’s wiped out.  Banned under Medicare-for-All.  Thanks for your service, soldier.
➡️ Your sister is a single mom whose child was covered under the popular Children’s Health Insurance Program.  That’s eliminated under #MedicareForAll

➡️Don’t look to your spouse’s health care plan.  The one their company offered, it’s gone too.  In fact, for the first time in America it’s illegal for employers to offer health care to their workers.

➡️ You wake up sick, and now you’re worried.  Because that great health care plan your union negotiated for you, the one that took care of you for so many years – it’s gone.  Banned under #MedicareForAll
Imagine a day in your life under #MedicareForAll...

#MedicareForAll guts health care in favor of delays & long waits

-gives Washington politicians unlimited control over your health care.  
-cancels good, quality health care plans for millions of workers, children, and the elderly.  
-Costs trillions of dollars
